comment: As an adult learner with dyslexia seeking additional tuition on writing at a postgraduate level, it can be quite a challenge to get the appropriate help! However, the support I have received from my teacher has been non-judgemental, focused and most importantly of all not overwhelming! My teacher has provided me with excellent support thus far and I'm looking forward to continue to develop my writing ability with her! :)

{name} has bridged the gap left by my uni. In plain speech during telephone conversations {name} told me what was wrong with my essay and told me how to fix it. {name} read each redraft and gave quality feedback and specific things to work on. Using {name} was the cleverest thing I did to solve the problem created by my uni's lack of availability.

{name} is an outstanding teacher with high level of integrity in giving the best to his students. {name} is resourceful and is knowledgeable in all he delivers. Comes with rigorous experience and has great passion for teaching that makes him a wonderful teacher. I elect four star for {name}.
Often late, seemed to be in hurry to finish the lesson
{name} was nice but put off the lesson 2 hours before
{name} was rude and very judgemental, I absolutely not recommend {name}
A bit unorganized, but great mindset and supportive, I learnt some good stuff
{name} didn't seem to have prepared the lesson
